title: IM NOT LVL 2
body: IM A LEVEL 30 AND THE WEBSITE WONT UPDATE. PLEASE HELP ;( I WANNA POST MY IDEAS ON LE FORUM BUT I CANT BECAUSE IM "LEVEL 2"

replies.body: Your account needs to sync to the boards when posting for the first time.  Usually, a post will do the trick, so everything looks okay now!  Let me know if you have any issues posting.

If you hadn't used the Boards in a long time, it's very likely your Summoner and Boards profiles fell out of sync. This post seems to have forced a resync, so it looks like you're all set!

Happy posting!
